Package CourseIndex

Class CourseIndex

Object
CourseIndex
public class CourseIndex
extends Object
CourseIndex is an object used to store all the indexes within the STARS system
Since:
2020-11-25
Version:
1.0
Author:
Goh Wei Pin

  • Field Summary

    Fields 
    Modifier and Type Field Description
    (package private) int academicUnits
    Each course will have a specific number of academic units
    (package private) ArrayList<ModType> allowedModType
    Each course will have a fixed number of allowed mod types it can be classified as (CORE, UE, GERPE_LA, GERPE_BM, GERPE_STS, MPE)
    (package private) String courseCode
    The course code uniquely defines the each course available to be taken in the STARS system
    (package private) int indexNo
    Each course index will have multiple unique course index numbers
    (package private) IndexWaitList indexWaitList
    Each course index will have a wait list to store students who are interested in taking the course but that particular index they are interested is full
    (package private) ArrayList<Lesson> lessons
    Each index will have a set of lessons such as Tutorials, Lectures or Labs
    (package private) ArrayList<String> registeredStudentMatricNo
    Each index will have a set of registered students
    (package private) String school
    Each course will have a school that is in charge of
    (package private) int vacancies
    Each index number will have a number that stores the vacancies available

  • Field Details

    • courseCode

      String courseCode
      The course code uniquely defines the each course available to be taken in the STARS system

    • indexNo

      int indexNo
      Each course index will have multiple unique course index numbers

    • academicUnits

      int academicUnits
      Each course will have a specific number of academic units

    • school

      String school
      Each course will have a school that is in charge of

    • allowedModType

      ArrayList<ModType> allowedModType
      Each course will have a fixed number of allowed mod types it can be classified as (CORE, UE, GERPE_LA, GERPE_BM, GERPE_STS, MPE)

    • indexWaitList

      IndexWaitList indexWaitList
      Each course index will have a wait list to store students who are interested in taking the course but that particular index they are interested is full

    • vacancies

      int vacancies
      Each index number will have a number that stores the vacancies available

    • registeredStudentMatricNo

      ArrayList<String> registeredStudentMatricNo
      Each index will have a set of registered students

    • lessons

      ArrayList<Lesson> lessons
      Each index will have a set of lessons such as Tutorials, Lectures or Labs

  • Constructor Details

    • CourseIndex

      public CourseIndex​(String courseCode, int indexNo, int academicUnits, String school, ArrayList<ModType> allowedModType, IndexWaitList indexWaitList, int vacancies, ArrayList<String> registeredStudentMatricNo, ArrayList<Lesson> lessons)
      Constructor to create the CourseIndex object
      Parameters:
      courseCode - The Course code of the course
      indexNo - The index number of the course
      academicUnits - The number of Academic units
      school - The school of the CourseIndex
      allowedModType - An ArrayList of ModTypes that this particular course can be classified as
      indexWaitList - An arraylist of student matriculation numbers who are interested to take a particular course index but vacancy is 0
      vacancies - The number of vacancies for the particular course index
      registeredStudentMatricNo - An ArrayList of student matriculation numbers who are currently enrolled
      lessons - An ArrayList of lessons that this course index has

    • toWrite

      public String toWrite()
      Used to format the CourseIndex object into one that can be written to the data CourseData.txt file
      Returns:
      Exact CourseIndex entry in the CourseData.txt file
